Info.Description:
Ceano's Custom Sights
Changes made by this mod: [list] [*] Changes the reticles for the sights. [/list]
Other Information: [list] [*] This mod is part of jvarnes' Open World Mod. [*] This mod is co-op friendly. [/list]
